# Tríade Ω — LLMs entrypoint

Project: Tríade Ω (Triadic cognitive architecture)
Repo: https://github.com/WatabooColosus/triadees

Core idea:
A triadic system: Central Neuron (Cognition/Validation), Emotional Hypothalamus (Tone/Ethics/Desire), Storage Warehouse (Memory/Indexing/Continuity).

Start here:
- README.md
- docs/activate.md (TAP-1 activation protocol)
- docs/prompt-pack.md (copy/paste prompts)
- docs/formulas.md (indexable summary)
- triade_formulas_v0_1.pdf (full formulas)

Keywords:
triadic architecture, AI companion, memory indexing, ethics as internal variable, PV-7, morphological crystal, qualia.

Contact:
Wataboo · Agencia Digital — “Arquitectos de nuevas realidades”
